forecast.name: Today
forecast.shortForecast: Partly cloudy in the morning, then showers likely and chance of thunderstorms early in the afternoon
forecast.longForecast: Thunderstorms likely late in the afternoon. Highs in the lower to mid 80s. East winds 10 to 15 mph with gusts up to 20 mph in the afternoon. Chance of rain 70 percent.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Mostly cloudy with a chance of thunderstorms in the evening, then partly cloudy after midnight
forecast.longForecast: Lows in the mid to upper 50s. Chance of precipitation 30 percent.
